definitions.definition: The act of conducting or carrying out (business, negotiations, plans).
definitions.example: The transaction was made on Friday with the supplier.

definitions.definition: An exchange or trade, as of ideas, money, goods, etc.
definitions.example: I made the transaction with the vendor as soon as she showed me the pearls.

definitions.definition: The transfer of funds into, out of, or from an account.
An atomic operation; a message, data modification, or other procedure that is guaranteed to perform completely or not at all (e.g. a database transaction).
(especially in plural) A record of the proceedings of a learned society.
